body.p: However, in response to comments received on D25, the IFRIC reconsidered whether the entity should initially measure equity instruments issued to a creditor to extinguish all or part of a financial liability at the fair value of the equity instruments issued or the fair value of the liability extinguished. The IFRIC noted that many respondents proposed that a preferred measurement basis should be determined to avoid an ‘accounting choice’ developing in practice, acknowledging that both measurement approaches would need to be used to identify which was more reliably determinable.
